mapper.select: select * from rpt_angel_list order by id asc limit 50
mapper.insert: insert into rpt_angel_list (id, user_name, organize_name, title, description) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
